pageProduct.name: A'kin Certified Organic Rosehip Oil 45ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Antioxidant and vitamin rich facial oil to nourish and hydrate for beautiful radiant skin.

- Nourishes and hydrates
- Helps to reduce appearance of scars and stretchmarks
- Fast absorbing

Restore moisture and revitalise skin with this 1% Certified Organic Rosehip Oil with a minimum concentration of 8% essential fatty acids (Omega 3,6,9) for optimal skin health. Antioxidant and vitamin rich to help protect the skin from the effect of environmental elements, prevent signs of ageing and help reduce the appearance of wrinkles.

Perfect for use on scars, uneven skin tone and nourishing dry lips. 

Warnings

Bottled in Australia using imported certified organic rosehip seed oil. We recommend patch testing before use. For external use only.

Ingredients

Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Extract+^, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract+^

+Organic, ^CO2 extraction

Directions

After cleansing apply 3-4 drops and gently massage into face, neck and decolletage prior to moisturiser. Use twice daily.

USAGE ADVICE

Absorbs faster into the skin if applied to warm or slightly dampened skin.
